name: LlamaPay
description: Automate & stream salaries by the second. Built by DefiLlama and used by iearnfinance, ConvexFinance, SpookySwap, tubbycatsnft, DeFi Wonderland and more

name: Coordinape
description: Tools for DAOs that do scale your community with tools to reward contributors, incentivize participation and manage resources.

name: Disperse
description: Distribute ether or tokens to multiple addresses.

name: Sablier
description: The protocol for real-time finance. Have instant access to your earnings through a money protocol built on Ethereum.

name: Superfluid
description: Handle subscriptions, salaries, rewards and any composable stream of value, with continuous settlement and per-second netting for extreme capital efficiency.

name: Roll
description: Roll is social token infrastructure for the internet.

name: Smart Invoice
description: Smart invoice builds trust between payer and payee by creating a secure neutral channel for transferring money.

name: Opolis
description: A Digital Employment Cooperative for the Independent Worker, health benefits, shared services and payroll.
